frame.name: Prevarication
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates about a <fen>Topic</fen> in such a way as to mislead an <fen>Addressee</fen>, either by telling outright lies or by presenting a message in a misleading form.
<ex><fex name="Speaker">I</fex> <t>lied</t> <fex name="Addressee">to you</fex> <fex name="Topic">about your Christmas present</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Speaker
FE.definition: <def-root>The person who uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey a deceptive Message to the Addressee. <ex><fex name="Speaker">Politicians</fex> do nothing but <m>tell</m> <t>lies</t> about money.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Addressee
FE.definition: <def-root>The person that receives a Message from the Speaker. <ex>You're <t>kidding</t> <fex name="Addressee">me</fex>!</ex> <ex>Satan <t>lies</t> <fex name="Addressee">to everyone, including himself</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Topic
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Topic</fen> is the entity to which the proposition or propositions relate, that they are about. <ex>You <t>deceived</t> me <fex name="Topic">about the location of the diamonds</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location at which the deception occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the deception occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The (communicative) action performed by the <fen>Speaker</fen> in order to deceive the <fen>Addressee</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of <fex name="Time">Time</fex> that the <fex name="Speaker">Speaker</fex> spends on the <fex name="Topic">Topic</fex>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The goal of the <fex name="Speaker">Speaker</fex>'s deceit of the <fen>Addressee</fen></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The extent to which the <fex name="Speaker">Speaker</fex> deceives the <fex name="Addressee">Addressee</fex> about the <fex name="Topic">Topic</fex>.</def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE describes how often the <fen>Speaker</fen> discusses the <fen>Topic</fen> with the <fen>Addressee</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: terugkrabbelen.v
lexUnit.definition: steeds meer laten merken dat je je niet wilt houden aan wat je hebt beloofd of dat je wil intrekken wat je hebt beweerd

lexUnit.name: ouwehoeren.v
lexUnit.definition: kletsen, vooral veel, lang en zinloos
